welcome_subtitle: Recycle, Earn Points, Change the World
welcome_desc: Join the community of students committed to the environment. Find recycling points on campus, earn points and redeem great rewards.
steps_desc: Three simple steps to start your environmental impact
step1_desc: Locate the nearest clean points at your university using our interactive map
step2_desc: Drop off your recyclables and log your activity to earn points automatically
step3_desc: Redeem your points for discounts on coffee shops, books, eco-friendly products and more
